rows.label: qst000904_msg0002
rows.name:
If it wasn't for friends, Doruru probably
baked into disgusting Igna pie by now.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0003
rows.name:
Meh... Thinking of sloshing around in
horrible cuisine make Doruru feel bit
sick...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks to friends for saving Doruru
from that horrible fate.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0005
rows.name:
But nasty Ignas make off with Doruru's
cargo of 500 Ruby Mangosteens...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0006
rows.name:
But no, Doruru should not complain.
Important thing is being alive!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0007
rows.name:
As long as Doruru alive, can always
start over and find new merchandise!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0008
rows.name:
Is partly fault of Doruru anyway.
Always risky to hire rookie mercenaries.
Was just unlucky this time.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0009
rows.name:
But sometimes difficulties in life
necessary for personal growth!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0010
rows.name:
Is job of merchants like Doruru to
provide up-and-coming mercenaries
with opportunity to grow!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0011
rows.name:
If Doruru give Lizzy's band a bit more
real-life experience, they surely grow
into fine fighting force.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0012
rows.name:
And then they provide Doruru quality
services at bargain rate! Is win-win!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0013
rows.name:
Mehmeh! Doruru predict bright future
for business!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0014
rows.name: OK! Friends take Doruru back to Lizzy?

rows.label: qst000904_msg0015
rows.name:
Doruru not likely to survive another
bashing from Ignas, so grateful to be
escorted.
